title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 322: Featuring Jody Shelley + Eric Engels
description:
On Episode 322 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Jody Shelley and Eric Engels. Eric joined the show (13:16) to talk all things Montreal Canadiens, including the recent firing of Claude Julien and what is next for Montreal. The guys also talk about the infamous “toe cheese” moment that happened on a recent live stream involving RA and Whit. The boys then talk some NHL news, including the struggling Buffalo Sabres, Patrick Kane putting up goal no.400, Calgary struggles and tons more. We are then joined by Jody Shelley (1:05:18), who joined to discuss his NHL career, fighting Bob Probert four straight periods, fighting Biz and tons more. The guys wrap up talking about the Minnesota Wild and the Tiger Woods news from last week.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
